DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect PF-06305591 capsaicin capsaicin/heat-induced neurogenic flare .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of PF-06305591 On Capsaicin And Capsaicin/Heat-Induced Neurogenic Flare
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Caucasian subject skin type IIII inclusive ( Fitzpatrick Scale ) , age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . An informed consent document sign date subject . Subjects must distance base scaphoid antecubital fossa equal great 26 cm forearm . Subjects demonstrate capsaicin mediate neurogenic flare value > 200 arbitrary Laser Doppler output time point 30 , 40 , 50 60 minute follow administration capsaicin Screening . Evidence history clinically significant hematological ( ie , abnormality due prolong exposure altitude ) , renal ) , endocrine dismetabolic , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic pain condition , dermatological allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Subjects scars tattoo forearm , evidence sunburn , excessively hairy volar forearm . History febrile illness within 5 day prior dose .
